item.description:
MERRY CHRISTMAS TO ALL!

Don't spend Christmas day alone.  My family is away this Christmas, and I'd love to host all others in my predicament for a Traditional Holiday Dinner (Menu below).  Christmas is a time of sharing, Be it  time with others, a kind word, or year long friendships.   And never a better time to develop new friendships.

 

All are welcome, but because this is a private home, address will be sent directly to YES RSVPs.  AND, because this is a private home, please either have a photo posted, or send one directly to me if you are "camera shy on the web".

Menu will include at least the following:

Turkey, Mashed Potatoes, "My mothers squash specialty recipe", green beans, rolls (Please remind me, I usually forget these in the oven!), and cranberry sauce,

Dessert will be Cranberry Cake, my first try, so let's hope it is as good as Carol's came out.

 

If anyone wants to bring an appetizer or dessert, please do so, but only plan on 6-8, to minimize food leftovers.  And, plan on bringing any dessert leftovers home with you.   My diet starts SOON (again)!

I'll also be collecting canned goods for the Dracut Food Pantry, for distribution on 12/29/12, if you would like donate. (Don't feel obligated, just if you want.  It's my 2012 pet charity)

 

LOOK FORWARD TO WISHING YOU A MERRY CHRISTMAS & A GREAT NEW 2013.
item.how_to_find_us: Gloria's House in Dracut, MA (Directions will be sent to YES RSVP's on Monday nite, and also Tues am)

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: Christmas Dinner & Social
